title: Super Pumped
description:
This week, Mike Isaac of the New York Times joins to talk about his new bookSuper Pumped which tells the dramatic story of Uber’s rise and fall. He and the hosts also get into the whole WeWork IPO debacle and the strike at GM. 
Plus: The Repo Market. 
This episode is brought to you by LightStream. Get an additional interest rate discount at lightstream.com/money.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
